quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Number and Follow
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, collections, tune. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Can you name this 80s tune:

options.text: dnt know how lost I was

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Like A Virgin

questions.question: Who was the lead singer of Deep Purple from 1973-1976?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Coverdale

questions.question: What popular 1950s quartet did Levi Stubbs front?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Four Tops

questions.question: This New Orleans funkster hit number 6 with 1970s Groove Me. His follow up Baby Let Me Kiss You didnt groove too many people, though, peaking at number 29.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: King Floyd

questions.question: This groups song Sideshow is a popular oldie which reached number 8. The follow up, Three-Ring Circus also released in 1974, didnt make it as far, despite having a similar theme.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blue Magic

questions.question: The Bellamy Brothers had a number one smash with Let Your Love Flow in 1976. They tried this lame pick-up line the next time around, and it peaked at number 39.

options.text: Your Feet Must Be Tired Cause Youve Been Running Through My Mind
There Must Be Something Wrong With My Eyes, I Cant Take Them Off You
If I Said You Had a Beautiful Body Would You Hold it Against Me
Ill Cook You Dinner if You Cook Me Breakfast

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: If I Said You Had a Beautiful Body Would You Hold it Against Me

questions.question: Who was the lead singer of  The Temptations from 1968-1977?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dennis Edwards

questions.question: This singers song Me and Mrs. Jones is frequently heard on oldies stations, which is not surprising, since it reached number one in 1972. For some reason we rarely heard his follow up, Thanks for Saving My Life.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billy Paul

questions.question: Name the 80s song which contains the following lyrics:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Down Under

questions.question: Disco become so popular in the late 70s that everyone had to get on the bandwagon.  What heavy metal act released the disco hit I Was Made for Lovin You?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: KISS

questions.question: This group cracked the top 10 in 1973 with Natural High. The next year Outside Woman only made it as high as number 34.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bloodstone

questions.question: A song found in many collections of 70s one hit wonders is Sky High (1975). It wasnt quite a one hit wonder, though, as the groups Love Fire made it to number 30 the following year. What was the group?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jigsaw

questions.question: Now in the street there is violence

options.text: d - and a lots of work to be done
d - and I cant blame all on the sun

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Electric Avenue

questions.question: The Canadian group The Poppy Family hit number 2 with Which Way You Goin Billy? in 1970. A few months later, this song performed by them peaked at number 29.

options.text: You Dont Know What Love Is

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thats Where I Went Wrong

questions.question: Maurice White and Philip Bailey were lead singers of this popular 1970s band.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Earth, Wind  Fire

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Ludwig Van Beethoven and City
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, symphony, following. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What important event in Ludwig van Beethovens life happened in 1798?

options.text: Beethoven wrote his first piano sonata
Beethoven wrote his first violin sonata
Beethoven first noticed his hearing loss

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beethoven first noticed his hearing loss

questions.question: To whom was the Beethovens Third Symphony originally dedicated?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Napoleon

questions.question: To which small town outside of Vienna did Ludwig Beethoven go in 1802?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heilgenstadt

questions.question: What 80s song contains the following lyrics:

options.text: A Total Eclipse of the Heart

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Total Eclipse of the Heart

questions.question: What is the nickname for Beethovens Fifth Symphony?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Fate

questions.question: In what city  was Ludwig van Beethoven born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bonn

questions.question: What was Ludwig van Beethovens major instrument?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Piano

questions.question: Im just an average man with an average life

options.text: l I want is to be left alone in my average home
t why do I always feel like Im in the Twilight Zone

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Somebodys Watching Me

questions.question: How many symphonies did Beethoven write?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 9

questions.question: What were Ludwig van Beethovens instructions for the Fifth Symphony?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Allegro con brio

questions.question: Can you name this 80s song:

options.text: night I wake up with the sheets soaking wet
d a freight train running through the

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im On Fire

questions.question: Which one of the following was not a teacher of Ludwig van Beethoven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mozart

questions.question: In what city did classical composer Beethoven die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vienna

questions.question: How many times was Ludwig van Beethoven married?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 0

questions.question: Give me time

options.text: Do You Really Want to Hurt Me?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Do You Really Want to Hurt Me?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Summer
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, summer, middle. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This group topped the charts in the summer of 74 with the song Rock The Boat. In the fall of 74, they didnt do as well with Rockin Soul.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hues Corporation

questions.question: In 1973, they made it to the top 10 with Stuck In The Middle With You. The next year, their follow up, Star didnt do as well.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stealers Wheel

questions.question: This singer had a top ten hit with Shannon in 1976, but only got as far as #37 with Springtime Mama later that year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Henry Gross

questions.question: She had a #1 smash in 1976 with Torn Between Two Lovers. Three years later, she only reached #39 with the song Good Friend (from the movie Meatballs).
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mary MacGregor

questions.question: She had a number 1 hit in 1977 with Dont Leave Me This Way, but two years later only made it to #34 with Saturday Night, Sunday Morning.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thelma Houston

questions.question: This singer had a hit song in the 80s with Gloria.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laura Branigan

questions.question: Who sang Pac -Man Fever in the 80s ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Buckner  and Garcia

questions.question: He hit #3 with I Like Dreamin in 1977, but didnt fare as well with his follow up, Loves Grown Deep later that year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kenny Nolan

questions.question: This group had a big hit with Moonlight Feels Right in the summer of 1976. Their attempt the next summer with Everybody Be Dancin only reached #38.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Starbuck

questions.question: This Canadian band hit it big with Sweet City Woman in 1971. Five years later, they only reached #40 with Hit The Road Jack, a song which featured Wolfman Jack.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stampeders

questions.question: In 1972, he had a #3 hit with (If Loving You Is Wrong) I Dont Want To Be Right. The next year he didnt do as well with Ill be Your Shelter (In Time Of Storm).
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Luther Ingram

questions.question: He reached #4 with Run Joey Run in the summer of 75, but didnt make it that far with The Last Game Of The Season (A Blind Man In The Bleachers) later that year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Geddes

questions.question: This singer reached number 6 with Do You Know What I Mean in 1971. His next song, Can I Get A Witness, only made it to #39 the same year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lee Michaels

questions.question: This artist had a #4 smash in 1979 with Chuck E.s In love. Her follow up, Young Blood snuck into the top 40 (at #40) for a single week.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rickie Lee Jones

questions.question: What group sang the 1979 song Aint No Stoppin Us Now?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: McFadden and Whitehead

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Band and Group
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, barre. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In 1970, British progressive rock keyboard player, Rick Wakeman, joined which group?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wild Cherry

questions.question: Who sang the 1983 hit song called Total Eclipse of the Heart?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bonnie Tyler

questions.question: John Wetton and Bill Bruford, former members of King Crimson, founded which British progressive rock group?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: UK

questions.question: This band had a hit song called Feel Like Makin Love.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bad Company

questions.question: Jon Anderson, best known as the lead singer of the progressive rock band, Yes, sang on which King Crimson album?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lizard

questions.question: This singer sang Seasons in the Sun in 1974.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Terry Jacks

questions.question: In 1975 while still a member of Genesis, Steve Hackett released his first solo album, Voyage of the Acolyte.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This English progressive rock band, formed in 1967, recorded the albums Pawn Hearts and Still Life.

questions.question: In 1969, Guitarist Martin Barre joined which rock band?

questions.question: This band had a hit song in the 80s called A Night to Remember.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shalamar

questions.question: This singer had a hit song in the 70s called Blue Bayou.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Linda Ronstadt

questions.question: What group sang the 1973 song Aint No Woman
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Four Tops

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Lloyd
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, iris, desk. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which female artist performed Have You Ever in 1998?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brandy

questions.question: Youre sitting on a train eyeing up the cute member of the opposite sex sitting across from you. Then suddenly they are speaking to you. However far away, I will always love you. However long I stay, I will always love you. Whatever words I say, I will always love you. I will always love you.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Love Song

questions.question: Time is slowly ticking by. It is almost home time. Your favorite song, Chunky Chunky Air Guitar, comes over the radio. After the song has finished and Lloyd has stopped his air guitar performance and come down from his desk, you ask him who the song is by. What does he say?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Whitlams

questions.question: Which band performed the 1997 song Sex and Candy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marcy Playground

questions.question: Finally the weekend is here! What is a better way to spend it than painting the house? Okay, so you dont have a life. You are looking at your red door. What colour MUST you paint it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Black

questions.question: Its Wednesday afternoon. You are sitting at your desk looking blankly at your computer screen. Suddenly a loud sneeze interrupts your thoughts of Saturday night. Its Mario, the office flirt. You ask him what is wrong and he says to you... Its getting cold and Im starting to sneeze. I wipe my nose on my sleeve. I got the sniffles, Id better drink my tea. Oh dya wanna, wanna catch a cold with me?  You politely refuse. Later Lloyd tells you that Mario stole his line from a song by whom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jewel

questions.question: Over lunch your workmate Lloyd is telling you about his weekend.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To the West

questions.question: Who performed the song What Its Like in 1998?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Everlast

questions.question: Which of these bands performed the song Iris in 1998?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Goo Goo Dolls

questions.question: After listening to Lloyds sad tale of his love life, your friend Julie, from accounts, tells you her tragic history with men. After she has finished Lloyd suggests that she follow what Placebo says. What is he talking about?

options.text: Get a hair cut and get a real job

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Change your taste in men

questions.question: The rock band Godsmack performed the song Comedown.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: You are called into your boss office. What have you done? She is looking out the window. Without turning to you she sings the following lines: I see a ship in the harbor. I can and shall obey.  But if it wasnt for your misfortune Id be a heavenly person today. What sort of day is your boss having?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Blue Monday

questions.question: Home time has finally rolled around, ending a very strange day. You are packing up your belongings when a blur runs past you screaming the words Sometimes I feel Ive got to run away, Ive got to get away. What song is this from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tainted Love

questions.question: Back to work on Monday morning. You find pinned to your computer a song written by a secret admirer: I love your skin, oh so white. I love your touch cold as ice and I love every single tear you cry. I just love the way youre losing your life

options.text: Gone with the Salvation of Mankind

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gone with the Sin

questions.question: Did Lenny Kravitz perform the song Are You Gonna Go My Way?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes
